Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Space Enthusiasts,

I've been playing Kerbal Space Program (obsessively) for a couple months now. Recently, however, I have moved to college and (although I brought my old save files with me) I decided to make a new save file and start off fresh. Here then, is my first space station in the works ... let me know what you think! (and maybe suggestions for what I should add.)

P.S. This is my first post, pardon me if I put it in the wrong section.
Unles my eyes are playing tricks on me the solar panels look a bit off, may i suggest a mod called "Docking port alignment by navyfish?

Unles my eyes are playing tricks on me the solar panels look a bit off, may i suggest a mod called "Docking port alignment by navyfish?

They look fine.
I actually manually aligned them. They WERE unaligned, and if they still are it's by less than 0.1 degree because I couldn't tell from a side view.
